resources.string:
Write a Java program to input marks of five subjects Physics, Chemistry, Biology, Mathematics and Computer, calculate percentage and grade according to given conditions: 
 If percentage >= 90% : Grade A 
 If percentage >= 80% : Grade B 
 If percentage >= 70% : Grade C 
 If percentage >= 60% : Grade D 
 If percentage >= 40% : Grade E 
 If percentage < 40% : Grade F 
 
 Example
 Input
 Input marks of five subjects:
 95
 95
 97
 98
 90

 Output
 Percentage = 95.00 
 Grade A

Write a C program to input basic salary of an employee and calculate gross salary according to given conditions. 
 Basic Salary <= 10000 : HRA = 20%, DA = 80%
 Basic Salary is between 10001 to 20000 : HRA = 25%, DA = 90%
 Basic Salary >= 20001 : HRA = 30%, DA = 95%
 How to calculate gross salary of an employee using if else in java programming. Program to calculate gross salary of an employee using if else in java program. Logic to find gross salary of employee in java program. Example
 Input
 Input basic salary of an employee: 2200

 Output
 Gross salary = 4400
